title: New Proxxon Thermocut Machine
item_description:
New Proxxon Thermocut Machine

  • New Proxxon Thermocut Machine – never used
  • Precision Cutting – Achieve clean cuts with a cutting wire temperature of 360Â°F, ensuring your projects look their best.
  • Versatile Design – The double-function fence with a lockable feed bar provides flexibility for various cutting tasks, making it perfect for hobbyists and professionals.
  • Smooth Work Surface – The large Aluminum Cobond compound working surface (15 11/32” × 11”) allows for easy and precise movement of workpieces, enhancing your cutting experience.
  • Easy Measurement – A printed grid and protractor on the base help with accurate division and cutting, ensuring your projects are done with precision.
  • Adjustable and Safe – The solid aluminum overarm (13 3/4” throat, 5” height) accommodates the 5 1/2” holder and wire coil (98 ft, 0.008” diameter) for miter cutting.
